tasks.task: Participate in a land stewardship program for sustainable agriculture
subtasks: Sign up for the Custodia Agraria program
Commit to adopting environmentally beneficial agricultural practices
Allow the land stewardship organization to perform various farm actions

tasks.task: Receive support from the land stewardship program
subtasks: Benefit from soil fertility improvements
Receive soil analysis and management recommendations
Implement directed grazing practices with assistance
Utilize provided materials for grazing management
Restore rainwater harvesting systems
Use solar power pumps for water systems
Apply key line landscaping techniques
Install covers on water canals and swales
Participate in annual bioindicator monitoring
Create water sources for wildlife
Install nesting boxes for natural pest control
Cooperate in natural value inventory of the farm
Volunteer for habitat maintenance and restoration
Protect livestock from heat in forested areas
Conserve wild pastures as priority habitats
Receive waste removal services
Benefit from installation of traditional wild olive tree gates
Restore dry stone walls for fruit tree protection
Promote sustainable agricultural products
Participate in training and consulting sessions
Engage in environmental education and outreach
